import A from"./TabButtons-nUWZmrVW.js";import c from"./RequestList-fPcb-EDd.js";import{m as T,c as B,t as C}from"./attendance-itKazsfi.js";import{m as L,t as p}from"./claims-D21Ne5Lw.js";import{m as M,t as l}from"./leaves-B-VT03YC.js";import S from"./AttendanceRequestItem-vgdYr7lC.js";import V from"./ExpenseClaimItem-Dq9JSwy0.js";import h from"./LeaveRequestItem-CXp4ZnMF.js";import w from"./ShiftRequestItem-BL9suadX.js";import{u as f}from"./realtime-B7Ysj-bK.js";import{a as x,i as E,c as d,a2 as D,e as N,j as n,k as U,l as b,A as _,a5 as j}from"./frappe-ui-C71hWP7q.js";import"./index-DVMUZnKy.js";import"./requestSummaryFields-DuWTbVwU.js";import"./FormattedField-CjHteFgn.js";import"./EmployeeAvatar-BSuwc1cA.js";import"./workflow-C_QZStpA.js";import"./formatters-CZQ3OL1A.js";import"./ListItem-DFSd-WXY.js";import"./ShiftIcon-CJ_5ruA1.js";const g={class:"w-full"},ne={__name:"RequestPanel",setup(O){const a=x("My Requests"),i=E("$socket"),R=["My Requests","Team Requests"],q=d(()=>r(M,L,B,T)),v=d(()=>r(l,p,C));function r(s,e,t,k){const u=[s,e,t,k].reduce((o,m)=>o.concat((m==null?void 0:m.data)||[]),[]),$={"Leave Application":h,"Expense Claim":V,"Shift Request":w,"Attendance Request":S};return u.forEach(o=>{o.component=D($[o.doctype])}),y(u)}function y(s){return s.sort((e,t)=>new Date(t.creation)-new Date(e.creation)).splice(0,10)}return N(()=>{f(i,"Leave Application",()=>l.reload()),f(i,"Expense Claim",()=>p.reload())}),(s,e)=>(n(),U("div",g,[b(A,{buttons:R,modelValue:a.value,"onUpdate:modelValue":e[0]||(e[0]=t=>a.value=t)},null,8,["modelValue"]),a.value=="My Requests"?(n(),_(c,{key:0,items:q.value},null,8,["items"])):a.value=="Team Requests"?(n(),_(c,{key:1,items:v.value,teamRequests:!0},null,8,["items"])):j("",!0)]))}};export{ne as default};
